message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The account name field is empty.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_NUM_EMPTY
message.locale: The account number field is empty.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The account type field is empty.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_IBAN_NUM_EMPTY
message.locale: At least IBAN and BIC or Account Number and Sort Code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_BIC_EMPTY
message.locale: BIC must be entered. When an IBAN is entered, a BIC is also required.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_IBAN_EMPTY
message.locale: IBAN must be entered. When a BIC is entered, an IBAN is also required.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_NUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: Account Number must be entered. When a Sort Code is entered, an Account Number is also required.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_FV_SORT_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Sort Code must be entered. When Account Number is entered, a Sort Code is also required.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_BIC_SORT_CODE_BELONG_TO_SAME_BRANCH
message.locale: Entered Sort Code and BIC should belong to same bank branch.

message.name: ERR_JOINBANKACCOUNT_VALIDATION_FAILURE_LIST
message.locale: The following errors occurred when Bank Account is set as Joint Account: %1s

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_VALIDATION_FAILURE_LIST
message.locale: The following errors occurred when entering the bank account: %1s

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_BANKBRANCH_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a bank account to a bank branch that has been canceled.
You cannot add a bank account to a bank branch that has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_START_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: Bank account start and end dates must be in between bank branch start and end dates.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_BANKBRANCH_CLOSED
message.locale: You cannot add a bank account to a bank branch that has been closed.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: A bank account must be selected or a new bank account entered.

message.name: ERR_BANKACCOUNT_XFV_MULTIPLE_SELECT
message.locale: A bank account must be selected or a new bank account entered but not both.
